pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet presents the proposed first floor plan for a residence, detailing the layout of key areas such as the living room, kitchen, family room, and garage. It also includes a proposed wood deck. Dimensions and room labels are clearly marked, providing a comprehensive view of the ground floor layout.

pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet shows the existing basement and first floor plans, highlighting areas such as the mechanical/laundry room, rec room, and crawl space in the basement, as well as the family room and kitchen on the first floor. It provides a detailed view of the existing layout for both levels.

pages.general_notes_verbatim:
P.T. RATING:
DECKING - UC3.2B
LEDGER BOARDS, JOISTS, BEAMS, STAIR STRINGERS - UC3.2C
POSTS - UC4.1
ALL EXTERIOR LVL BEAMS WRAPPED AGAINST MOISTURE
NUMBER OF RISERS TO BE CONFIRMED ON SITE PRIOR TO COMMENCEMENT OF WORK.
EXISTING GRADE TO REMAIN. NO CHANGE
NOTE:
CONTRACTOR TO VERIFY ON SITE ALL ASSUMED JOIST DIRECTIONS, LOCATION OF ALL BEAMS AND COLUMNS BEFORE COMMENCING CONSTRUCTION & REPORT ANY DISCREPANCIES TO DESIGNER BEFORE PROCEEDING.
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet outlines the proposed basement structural plan, including the layout for the basement and details for the proposed rear wood deck. It includes a sonotube detail and general notes regarding material specifications and construction verification requirements.
